pullRequest.title: Personnel XP Standardization
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR standardizes how personnel experience is done, removing the need (if there even was one, cause I can't see a reason for it after going over the code) for a separate count for engineering xp. I also used this to make some more formatting changes to improve readability.
